id-22675.title: Pet Services
id-22675.post-content:
The Pet Services template uses an emotive image front and center to begin building a relationship with the reader. That is complemented by friendly fonts, approachable colors and a nice feel throughout the template.

The design is simple but very effective, with a combination of dark, light and the orange color keeping things light and accessible. There are a range of flexible content areas to help tell your story along with opportunities to accept donations.

Key features of the Pet Services template

  • Emotive image to being building relationships
  • Great use of whitespace on all pages
  • Default colors and fonts work well
  • Option to accept donations through the website
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-22675.post-excerpt: Emotive template that could be used for any type of pet shop or pet services company

id-22129.title: Shoe Store
id-22129.post-content:
The Shoe Store template engages as soon as you open the page. It’s an eCommerce website template that sets the scene with a full screen image with graphic overlay and then unfolds into a white page with several product areas, a slider, product highlights and more.

The overall design is modern, sleek and set the scene for buying. It has an excellent layout, lots of whitespace and flexible content areas you can customize to suit your exact needs. It would work for any type of store!

Key features of the Shoe Store template

  • Engaging eCommerce template designed to sell
  • Flexible content and product areas on every page
  • Cart in the header for seamless checkout
  • Can be customized to suit any type of store
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-22129.post-excerpt: Engaging eCommerce template that can be used for any type of online store

id-22073.title: Custom Printing
id-22073.post-content:
The Custom Printing online is an online store template with an energetic, youthful vibe. It could be ideal for any type of store and could be fully customized with ease thanks to page builder compatibility.

The design uses whitespace well and uses imagery to help create that feeling of engagement. There are areas for special offers, featured products and content areas you can use to showcase your products.

Key features of the Custom Printing template

  • Youthful eCommerce template with instant appeal
  • Uses images and superb layout to create engagement
  • Featured product and highlight sections included
  • Attractive product and category pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-22073.post-excerpt: Youthful eCommerce template designed to sell any kind of product with ease

id-55450.title: Professional Services
id-55450.post-content:
The Professional Services template is a flexible business template that could be used for any type of website. It uses classic design with light and dark areas, images and a calm yellow contrast color.

The template includes essential content areas for products and services and the ability to add, change or remove anything you see on the page. It’s a very relaxed design that could work for many types of business with minimal effort.

Key features of the Professional Services template

  • Calm, professional template ideal for any niche
  • Classic design with light, dark, images and content
  • Create a business website with minimal effort
  • Effective contrast color for calls to action
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-55450.post-excerpt: Calm web design that includes everything the modern business needs to communicate

id-22100.title: Yoga Studio
id-22100.post-content:
The Yoga Studio web template is as relaxing and embracing as yoga itself. It opens gently with a shaded image and comfortable green colorway before opening up to whitespace and calm graphics.

The template includes essential content areas for yoga studios including product and service areas, awards and qualifications, classes and times and call to action buttons for reservations. You will want for nothing with this template!

Key features of the Yoga Studio template

  • Calm and tranquil design ideal for the yoga niche
  • Includes essential content areas for yoga studios
  • Extra pages all relevant to the niche
  • Popup contact form works well
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-22100.post-excerpt: Tranquil website design for yoga teachers, yoga studios and wellness centers

id-22080.title: Disc Jockey
id-22080.post-content:
The Disc Jockey template is instantly engaging and designed to make an impact. It includes a vibrant video background and coloured overlay with headlines and an area to share the dates of your next show.

The rest of the template uses a compelling design to share who you are, sell your latest releases, promote your shows and generally tell your story. If you’re a performer of any kind, this template has all the features you need.

Key features of the Disc Jockey template

  • Engaging muted video background
  • Vibrant colors and design
  • Includes readymade content areas ideal for the niche
  • Fully compatible with WooCommerce or Easy Digital Downloads
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-22080.post-excerpt: Dark, atmospheric template ideal for websites for DJs, performers and artists

id-22060.title: Windows & Doors Services
id-22060.post-content:
The Windows & Doors Services template opens with a fullscreen image and inquiry form, ideal for the nature of this business. Alternating dark and light backgrounds divide spaces naturally, providing lots of content areas for you to tell your story.

The design is modern and uses complementing colors that create authority and trust, ideal if you’re dealing with big ticket items. The design is infinitely flexible and offers the opportunity to customize everything you see on the page.

Key features of the Windows & Doors Services template

  • Modern business website template that creates trust and authority
  • Call to action and inquiry form front and center
  • Great use of fonts, colors and whitespace
  • Supporting pages reflect the core design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-22060.post-excerpt: Business-oriented web template that could be used for any type of modern business

id-22044.title: Accountant
id-22044.post-content:
The Accountant template is a business-like but appealing design that mixes sober design required by the niche with light-hearted graphics to add a little levity. It’s an accomplished design that includes everything a business needs to launch a website.

The design uses a great mix of colors, a calm layout with plenty of whitespace and subtle background variations to signal changes of intent. It’s a very well designed theme, ideal for all kinds of businesses.

Key features of the Accountant template

  • Flexible and accessible design for accountants and other businesses
  • Graphical elements add a little fun
  • All the important content elements are taken care of
  • Supplementary pages reflect the overall design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-22044.post-excerpt: Interesting design that’s perfect for accountants and all kinds of service businesses

id-54393.title: Health & Wellness
id-54393.post-content:
The Health & Wellness template reflects the clean, crisp feel you would want to see in a dentist or healthcare setting. It’s a modern flat web template with distinct borders, a reassuring blue colorway and modern fonts, ideal for health and wellness.

The template includes lots of content and image sections, service areas, calls to action, testimonials and a simple but effective contact page. Everything you see can be customized to your needs, adding to its appeal.

Key features of the Health & Wellness template

  • Crisp, clean design that reflects the health and wellness niche
  • Customizable business template that could work for any business
  • Flexible content and image areas throughout
  • Attractive content page designed to convert
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-54393.post-excerpt: Crisp, clean website design that works perfectly for health and wellness businesses
